_sText:
Hello everyone. Today I finished the second version of me probably the best map. Thinking that after this version will do the final version. I'll finish the last treatments and thus end up with zm maps. Big thanks to Terrora.. I could fix a lot of smaller bugs and do a lot of adjustments:

10.1.2010

Fixed the bug of some shadow of ladders and other models.
Added the east of the basement.
Added on the other side of the map smaller barn.
Replacement models of wending machine.
Added blood.
Added well.
And many more little things, which you most likely will not notice while playing.

11.1.2010

Unfortunately I could not change the weight or model of wardrobe(hard to be pushed)
because I could not find a replacement.
